title: Ti Shen - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Body-double   Clever Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kuudere   Modern Day   Organized Crime   Past Plays a Big Role   R*pe   Showbiz   Slow Romance
author: Bei Tang Mo   北棠墨
description:
'I hope you don't fall in love with me, because I won't be taking responsibility,' warned the young man. 'Don't worry, I won't fall in love with a body double,' the employer dully replied. Yet, both of them forgot what they had said.

One entered the play and couldn't come out of it. The other one was willing to act with him for the rest of his life.>
